inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getRandomPassword.

excludeCharacters.description: String of the characters that you don't want in the password.

excludeLowercase.description: Specifies whether to exclude lowercase letters from the password.

excludeNumbers.description: Specifies whether to exclude numbers from the password.

excludePunctuation.description: Specifies whether to exclude the following punctuation characters from the password: ``! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ ` { | } ~ .``

excludeUppercase.description: Specifies whether to exclude uppercase letters from the password.

includeSpace.description: Specifies whether to include the space character.

requireEachIncludedType.description: Specifies whether to include at least one upper and lowercase letter, one number, and one punctuation.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getRandomPassword.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
